short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension showing current status of your monitored URLs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you monitor your website? Do you use cula.io? This extension allows you to get information immediately. Be first to know whether your websites are all up!
